name: 2008_facility_greenhouse_gas_data
title: 2008 Facility Greenhouse Gas Data
description: This Greenhouse Gas Emissions Reporting Program (GHGRP) is Canada’s legislated, publicly-accessible inventory of facility-reported greenhouse gas (GHG) data and information. This section provides highlights from the latest reporting year -- including a brief overview and analysis of the reported facility data, key data tables, and online search tool.

resources.description: This Greenhouse Gas Emissions Reporting Program (GHGRP) is Canada’s legislated, publicly-accessible inventory of facility-reported greenhouse gas (GHG) data and information.
